hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_WEB_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the container name used by the docker engine. (gobii-web-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GOBII_WAR_DOWNLOAD_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The download link for the gobii-web.war file. These downloads are hosted in the gobii.deploy.bash dowloads link.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GOBII_WEB_WAR_HOTFIX_FILE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name of the file downloaded as the gobii-web.war from bitbucket. (gobii-web.war222_b3_hotfix_20200825)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CROP1_WAR_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the crop war file. (gobii-dev.war)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the branch being used for the gobii.deploy.bash repo. (release/2.2.2) (develop)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
#--------------------------------------#
set -e # Abort script at first error set -u # Attempt to use undefined variable outputs error message #set -x # Verbose with commands displayed
#--------------------------------------#
# run crop war replacement scripts time bash hotfix/hotfix_scripts/hotfix_replace_crop_war.sh
#--------------------------------------#
echo "GOBii Hotfix Complete. Good Bye." echo;
